channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AI agents can talk — orchestration is what makes them work together
item.description: Rather than asking how AI agents can work for them, a key question in enterprise is now: Are agents playing well together? This makes orchestration across multi-agent systems and platforms a critical concern — and a key differentiator. “Agent-to-agent communications is emerging as a really big deal,” G2’s chief innovation officer Tim Sanders told VentureBeat. “Because if you don't orchestrate it, you get misunderstandings, like people speaking foreign languages to each other. Those misunderstandings reduce the quality of actions and raise the specter of hallucinations, which could be security ...

item.title: Musique générée par IA : Bandcamp tranche et c’est non
item.description: Bandcamp a choisi son camp, et ce n'est pas celui de l'IA générative. La plateforme musicale refuse désormais les morceaux entièrement générés ou en grande partie générés par IA. Une clarification attendue par de nombreux utilisateurs du service, mais aussi par les artistes.

item.title: Docusign wants to use AI to turn your complex contracts into plain English
item.description: Docusign is using AI to help consumers summarize and interact with contracts in a way that they can actually understand.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones gaming en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous êtes en quête d'un bon smartphone gaming ? Grâce à cette sélection, vous trouverez le modèle de téléphone qu'il vous faut pour jouer à des jeux exigeants tels que Fortnite, PUBG ou Genshin Impact.

item.title: Amazon multiplie les offres à la 2e démarque des soldes : le TOP 18 des deals
item.description: Amazon réserve parfois ses meilleures offres pour ses membres Prime, mais pendant les soldes d'hiver, tout le monde peut profiter des réductions du géant américain. Découvrez ici les deals qui valent le coup à la 2e démarque.

item.title: Bandcamp prohibits music made ‘wholly or in substantial part’ by AI
item.description: Bandcamp has addressed the AI slop problem vexing musicians and their fans of late. The company is banning any music or audio on its platform that is "wholly or in substantial part" made by generative AI, according to its blog. It also clarified that the use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles is “strictly prohibited” by policies already in place. Any music suspected to be AI generated may be removed by the Bandcamp team and the company is giving users reporting tools to flag such content. "We believe that the human connection found through music is a vital part of our society a...

item.title: Les trottinettes électriques en libre-service de retour à Paris en 2026 ? L’astucieuse alternative de cet opérateur peut tout changer
item.description: Le nouvel opérateur Straik souhaite relancer les trottinettes électriques en libre-service à Paris dès le printemps 2026, au sein de commerces partenaires.

item.title: VoiceRun nabs $5.5M to build voice agent factory
item.description: VoiceRun, a startup that creates voice agents, raised $5.5 million in a round led by FlyBridge.

item.title: Senegal vs Egypt Free Streams: How to watch AFCON 2025 semi-final online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Senegal vs Egypt live streams for FREE from anywhere, as Mo Salah chases long-awaited AFCON glory for Egypt.

item.title: Fujifilm’s latest Instax Mini printer focuses on the details
item.description: Fujifilm is launching a new Instax Mini smartphone printer that produces finer details than its predecessors. The Instax Mini Link Plus features enhanced image processing compared to older Instax printers, and a similar industrial design to the Instax Mini Evo Cinema camera announced last week, which Fujifilm has now also revealed pricing for. The Instax […]...

item.title: Débrief CES 2026, l’iPhone Fold imprimé en 3D et nos astuces pour choisir sa box Internet : gros programme pour l’Unlock Talk du jour
item.description: Rendez-vous ce mercredi 14 janvier à partir de 17h sur notre chaîne Twitch Frandroidlive pour suivre la 41e édition d’Unlock Talk. Au menu du jour : un gros débrief du CES 2026, l’affaire Netflix-Warner, l’iPhone Fold et nos astuces pour bien choisir votre box Internet.

item.title: Elevation Lab's extended battery AirTag case is down to only $16
item.description: AirTags already have a decently long battery life, but you will end up needing to replace the coin cell every two years or so. If you don't even want to be bothered with that, Elevation Lab made just the accessory for you: its AirTag battery case that can power the tracker for up to 10 years is on sale for 30 percent off. You can pick one up for only $16, and it's available in two- and four-packs as well at a discount. The TimeCapsule case uses two AA batteries to offer up to 14 times the lifespan of the CR2032 battery that powers an AirTag. The company based those estimates on Energizer Ultim...

item.description: Best Buy's current deal is a match for the best we've ever seen

item.title: The RAM shortage claims another victim as PS5 SSD prices rocket — here's why now is the worst time to buy and what to do instead
item.description: Thanks to ongoing RAM supply issues it's now a terrible time to buy a PS5 SSD. Here's why the situation is so bad, and some alternatives to consider.

item.title: Get one month of the Disney+ and Hulu bundle for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : voici les offres immanquables de la deuxième démarque sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty…
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver ont commencé la semaine dernière et nous voici déjà à la deuxième démarque ! Au programme : encore plus d'offres pour des produits Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique.

item.title: UK police blame Microsoft Copilot for intelligence mistake
item.description: The chief constable of one of Britain's largest police forces has admitted that Microsoft's Copilot AI assistant made a mistake in a football (soccer) intelligence report. The report, which led to Israeli football fans being banned from a match last year, included a nonexistent match between West Ham and Maccabi Tel Aviv. Copilot hallucinated the […]...

item.title: Spotify denies it’s pushing unwanted AI slop onto subscribers, claiming it ‘does not promote or penalize tracks created using AI tools’
item.description: Spotify says it's not the reason why unwanted AI music is appearing in your Discover Weekly playlist.

item.title: Matthew McConaughey fights unauthorized AI likenesses by trademarking himself
item.description: Matthew McConaughey filed trademark applications to prevent his likeness from being used by AI companies without permission, and the US Patent and Trademark Office has approved eight so far. According to the Wall Street Journal, the trademarks were for video and audio clips featuring the actor staring, smiling and talking. One was for a video of him standing on a porch, while another was for an audio recording of him saying “alright, alright, alright,” his signature catchphrase from the movie Dazed and Confused.Under the law, it’s already prohibited for companies to steal someone’s likeness to...

item.title: Boîte de réception | Comptes Facebook, gestion de mots de passe et effacement des données
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se demande s’il faut enregistrer localement son identifiant Facebook, on compare les gestionnaires de mots de passe et on efface durablement des données.

item.title: Android Auto users complain about broken Google Assistant, as the slow Gemini rollout continues
item.description: Many users are still waiting for Gemini to arrive on Android Auto, while finding that Google Assistant is giving up.

item.title: Instax ressuscite le Super 8 : découvrez la caméra qui imprime vos vidéos

item.title: Meta to reportedly lay off 10% of Reality Labs staff
item.description: Meta is laying off 10% of staff in its Reality Labs division, which is core to developing the company's VR and metaverse products.

item.title: Ne commandez pas votre Galaxy S25 reconditionné avant de lire ça
item.description: Vous voulez un Galaxy S25 Ultra sans payer le prix fort, mais le reconditionné vous fait peur ? Samsung arrive avec sa solution Certified Re-newed. C'est propre, c'est garanti deux ans, mais problème : c'est surtout plus cher que le neuf dans bien des cas.

item.title: Daniel Ek believes prevention is the key to a long life. He’s bringing a ‘new healthcare experience’ to NYC for the first time
item.description: The Spotify cofounder has seen impressive growth for his three-year-old body-scanning startup, helmed by CEO Hjalmar Nilsonne. Neko Health is taking its body-scanning technology to America.

item.description: The perfect kitchen companions, these versatile blenders can whip up breakfasts, dips, milkshakes, cocktails, and everything in between.

item.title: « On en a trop fait » : le lancement du smartphone « PlayStation » est repoussé après les critiques
item.description: Ayaneo s'est perdu. À force de vouloir occuper tous les segments du jeu vidéo portable, la marque a fini par oublier l'essentiel : le client. Aujourd'hui, son CEO Arthur Zhang annonce un virage stratégique majeur pour 2026 et suspend le lancement de son premier smartphone.

item.description: If you want a Cybertruck of any kind, you're going to have to support a monster.

item.description: La dernière version bêta de l’application introduit sur iOS une fonction de suggestion de stickers basée sur des émojis présents dans un message.

item.description: It turns out that this TikTok-viral vibration plate may have some surprising health benefits.

item.title: Qu’est-ce que Zorin OS : la distribution Linux qui décolle depuis la fin de Windows 10
item.description: 75 % des nouveaux utilisateurs de Zorin OS viennent directement de Windows. En tuant le support de Windows 10, Redmond a créé un appel d'air massif pour cette distribution Linux irlandaise.

item.title: Tesla's Full Self-Driving is switching to a subscription-only service
item.description: Tesla will stop selling its $8,000 Full Self-Driving (FSD) option and make it strictly a monthly subscription service after February 14, CEO Elon Musk announced on his X platform. Musk didn't reveal the price or why he's making the switch, though FSD is already available by subscription for $99 per month or $999 per year. The shift could be advantageous for buyers, particularly if they decide to dump their new Tesla or trade it in. It will also allow prospective owners to hedge their bets, as Tesla has overpromised on the feature since it was first announced. Tesla will stop selling FSD afte...

item.title: 5 Ways NASA’s Artemis 2 Mission Will Make Spaceflight History
item.description: The first crewed spaceflight of NASA’s Artemis program will break records, achieve historic firsts, and pave the way for America’s return to the Moon.

item.title: Dance, Magic Dance Your Way to ‘Labyrinth’ in Concert
item.description: Jim Henson's fantasy classic starring David Bowie, Jennifer Connelly, and a whole bunch of Muppets is hitting the road with a live band.

item.title: How AI Companies Got Caught Up in US Military Efforts
item.description: Two years ago, companies like Meta and OpenAI were united against military use of their tools. Now all of that has changed.

item.title: What is the release date for Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 8 on Starz?
item.description: The Brothers Ferox have been all but eliminated thanks to Korris, but that can't be the end of the story. So, when is Spartacus: House of Ashur released on Starz?

item.title: Roxberry is a ‘better-for-you’ soda, but its branding is an absolute sugar rush
item.description: Characters inspired by the Kool-Aid Man ‘bring fun back to kids’ beverages.’ Andy Sauer is no stranger to making waves in the beverage business. As the CEO of Garage Beer, he defied the odds by turning a small craft brewery into a national name, despite competing in an industry dominated by legacy players. Now he’s looking to shake things up in another popular beverage category: the soda aisle....

item.title: ICE vs ice videos from Minnesota put the agency’s weaknesses on display
item.description: As ICE continues its raids in Minneapolis, viral videos of agents unequipped for the city’s weather show them as they really are. Minneapolis is currently inundated with two kinds of ice—both of which make it hard for residents to move about the city.

item.title: Vie numérique | Une waifu animée par l’IA bientôt sur votre bureau
item.description: Bienvenue dans l’ère des waifu et des husbando. Ces termes issus de la culture manga désignent un personnage fictif (souvent un anime japonais) par lequel une personne est attirée sentimentalement ou qu’elle considère comme son idéal du sexe opposé. Ces personnages prennent vie en 2026, puisque surgissent de petites enceintes interactives qui leur donnent vie, presque littéralement....

item.title: Mauvaise nouvelle chez Free : le prix de deux Freebox augmente dès aujourd’hui
item.description: Free durcit sa politique tarifaire en augmentant simultanément les prix de ses offres Freebox Pop S et Révolution Light. Des ajustements qui sont effectifs dès aujourd'hui pour les nouveaux abonnés.

item.title: The most controversial film of 2024 is one of Prime Video's most-watched movies — and it has to be streamed to be believed
item.description: Sometimes I wonder why you guys like the stuff you like – but with the worst movie of 2024 now trending on Prime Video, I can more than see the appeal.

item.title: RAM crisis lands another blow as Nvidia could stick to 8GB with mainstream GPUs for the foreseeable future — but is that enough in 2026?
item.description: Nvidia rumor suggests a focus on 8GB GPUs in the near future, with the RTX 5060 Ti 16GB sidelined in favor of its lesser sibling.

item.title: The five résumé trends you need to know about for 2026
item.description: A modern CV needs to be substantive, AI-savvy, and ready before anyone asks for it. Hiring in 2026 won’t look much like hiring even two years ago. If you don’t pay attention, you will get left behind. I was a retained search consultant for 25-plus years. I’ve written executive and board résumés for the last 10 years. I’ve never seen so much change in candidate sourcing happen so quickly....
